description: This marinade creates juicy, tender and flavoursome chicken. Oven bake or BBQ.
name: Buttermilk Dijon and Herb Chicken Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: You can either oven roast or BBQ the chicken. I did these in the oven. add a little oil to an oven proof dish, pop the chicken in and cook for around 30 minutes. They may cook a little quicker on the BBQ depending on how the heat level is. (The chicken will caramelise as a result of the marinade) Serve with veggies or salad. Enjoy
